document.full_text: norwich city is going back to the english premier league for the first time since 2005, and the club is taking its american defender zak whitbread with it.
document.title: norwich city and whitbread movin' on up
lines_and_colors: norwich city is going back to the english premier league for the first time since 2005, and the club is taking its american defender zak whitbread with it.
